sentences: JÃ¼rgen Knieper (born 14 March 1941) is a German film score composer.
Born in Karlsruhe, he was educated at Berlin's State High School of Music.
He began working for director Wim Wenders with his 1972 film The Goalkeeper's Fear of the Penalty.
For Wenders' 1975 film The Wrong Move, Knieper won the German Film Award for Best Music.
Wenders turned to Knieper again for the music of his 1987 film Wings of Desire.
In 1990, he was nominated for the European Film Award for Best Composer for December Bride.
